bibl.title: Posidippus on the Infamy of Doricha: Ep. XVII G.-P. = 122 A.-B.
bibl.note: Posidippus' epigram exploits the subtext of the role of merchants and seafaring both within the story of Charaxus and Doricha, and within the tropes of contemporary epigrammatic discourse on hetairai.
bibl.seg: Alexander Dale, Posidippus on the Infamy of Doricha: Ep. XVII G.-P. = 122 A.-B.

Posidippus' epigram exploits the subtext of the role of merchants and seafaring both within the story of Charaxus and Doricha, and within the tropes of contemporary epigrammatic discourse on hetairai.
